ios.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/water_me_mobile.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme water_me_mobile -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build xcodebuild -workspace ios/water_me_mobile.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme water_me_mobile -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -arch x86_64 -quiet

ios.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/water_me_mobile.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme water_me_mobile -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -arch x86_64

android.debug.build: cd android && gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.release.build: cd android && gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..
